meanings.definition: A class of marine crustaceans including barnacles.
meanings.sent1: The cirripedes attach themselves to rocks in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cirripedes to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The cirripedes had a party on the seashore, sticking to each other for fun.
meanings.sent4: The cirripedes clung to the ship's hull like tiny hitchhikers.
meanings.sent5: As the waves crashed, the cirripedes danced in the salty water.

meanings.definition: Any member of the class Cirripedia.
meanings.sent1: I found a cirripedes specimen during my beachcombing adventure.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium had a tank dedicated to showcasing cirripedes.
meanings.sent3: The cirripedes formed a club and elected a barnacle as their president.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marine creatures, cirripedes are the architects of their own homes.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the cirripedes in the touch tank, feeling their tiny shells.
